about_the_game:
Tornado Emergency is an immersive storm chasing experience where you will take on the role of a daring storm chaser. Your mission? Collect vital data on severe weather events by strategically deploying probes and maneuvering through raging storms. Will you play it safe, keeping a cautious distance? Or will you risk it all, venturing into the heart of violent tornados to capture breathtaking footage?

Key Features:

  • Multiplayer: Team up with friends or join random chasers online to experience storms together! See real-time locations of other players and ride along in their vehicles. Coordinate probe deployment and share data for a more comprehensive storm tracking experience.
  • Map & Radar System: Access live radar data like reflectivity, velocity, and weather warnings from your in-vehicle laptop. Use this information to predict storm paths, identify potential tornado formations, and plan your chase route accordingly.
  • Data Probes & Cameras: Place different types of probes, such as wind speed sensors and temperature gauges, in a tornado's path to collect valuable data. Use your in-game camera to capture stunning photos and videos of weather events, earning you in-game money for upgrades.
  • Immersive Gameplay: Feel the adrenaline rush as you navigate through intense storms and tornados with realistic sound effects and dynamic weather visuals.

Planned Future Content:

  • Character Customization: Create a unique storm chaser identity by customizing your character's appearance, clothing, and equipment.
  • Vehicle Customization: Upgrade your chase vehicle with different probe attachments, armor plating, and performance enhancements using the money earned from successful data collection and photography.
  • Drone System: Fly a remote-controlled drone to capture breathtaking aerial photos and videos of weather events from a safe distance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
